languages.text: "Архивраг не дремлет ни мгновения, высматривая, где бы нанести удар по верным. Этот корабль — лишь еще один пример из массы, напоминание о том, что у нас нет права терять бдительность".
"The Archenemy never sleeps, but is forever seeking opportunities to strike at His faithful. This ship is just one example of many, a reminder that we have no right to let our guard down."
languages.original_text: "Архивраг не дремлет ни мгновения, высматривая, где бы нанести удар по верным. Этот корабль — лишь еще один пример из массы, напоминание о том, что у нас нет права терять бдительность".

languages.text: “混沌大敌永远不会休息，他们总是会伺机袭击神皇的信徒。这艘船就是活生生的例子，它提醒我们，我们没有权利放松警惕。”
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy never sleeps, but is forever seeking opportunities to strike at His faithful. This ship is just one example of many, a reminder that we have no right to let our guard down."

traits.locale_text: “混沌大敌永远不会休息，他们总是会伺机袭击神皇的信徒。这艘船就是活生生的例子，它提醒我们，我们没有权利放松警惕。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Le Grand Ennemi ne dort jamais. Il cherche constamment un moyen de s'en prendre à Ses fidèles. Ce vaisseau n'est qu'un exemple parmi d'autres qui confirme que nous ne devons jamais baisser la garde. »
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy never sleeps, but is forever seeking opportunities to strike at His faithful. This ship is just one example of many, a reminder that we have no right to let our guard down."

traits.locale_text: « Le Grand Ennemi ne dort jamais. Il cherche constamment un moyen de s'en prendre à Ses fidèles. Ce vaisseau n'est qu'un exemple parmi d'autres qui confirme que nous ne devons jamais baisser la garde. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «El Archienemigo nunca duerme, sino que busca constantemente oportunidades de atacar a los fieles. La nave es solo otro ejemplo de muchos. Un recordatorio de que no podemos bajar nunca la guardia».
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy never sleeps, but is forever seeking opportunities to strike at His faithful. This ship is just one example of many, a reminder that we have no right to let our guard down."

traits.locale_text: «El Archienemigo nunca duerme, sino que busca constantemente oportunidades de atacar a los fieles. La nave es solo otro ejemplo de muchos. Un recordatorio de que no podemos bajar nunca la guardia».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「渾沌の勢力が眠ることなどない、皇帝の信徒を襲う機会をずっと狙い続けている。このシップは数多の例のひとつにすぎない、油断など許されないということだ」
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy never sleeps, but is forever seeking opportunities to strike at His faithful. This ship is just one example of many, a reminder that we have no right to let our guard down."

traits.locale_text: 「渾沌の勢力が眠ることなどない、皇帝の信徒を襲う機会をずっと狙い続けている。このシップは数多の例のひとつにすぎない、油断など許されないということだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Der Erzfeind schläft niemals, doch er sucht unaufhörlich nach Gelegenheiten, die Gläubigen anzugreifen. Dieses Schiff ist nur ein Beispiel von vielen, eine Erinnerung daran, dass wir stets wachsam bleiben müssen."
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy never sleeps, but is forever seeking opportunities to strike at His faithful. This ship is just one example of many, a reminder that we have no right to let our guard down."

traits.locale_text: "Der Erzfeind schläft niemals, doch er sucht unaufhörlich nach Gelegenheiten, die Gläubigen anzugreifen. Dieses Schiff ist nur ein Beispiel von vielen, eine Erinnerung daran, dass wir stets wachsam bleiben müssen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Archenemy never sleeps, but is forever seeking opportunities to strike at His faithful. This ship is just one example of many, a reminder that we have no right to let our guard down."

languages.text: "Şerbaşı uyumaz, O'nun sadık kullarına saldırmak için fırsat kollar. Bu gemi gibi birçok örnek var. Hepsi de gardımızı düşürme seçeneğimiz olmadığının kanıtı."
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy never sleeps, but is forever seeking opportunities to strike at His faithful. This ship is just one example of many, a reminder that we have no right to let our guard down."
